title: Welcome - Chi Energized Acupuncture & Wellness Center
description: Holistic wellness center with all-natural healing services including Acupuncture, Therapeutic massage, Herbal medicine, Organic facial, Organic Body Wrap, and Microneedling. As well as shop the variety and selection of high-quality herbs and nutrients, natural pain relief products, and Organic Eminence Skincare products.
cleaned_text: Welcome Thank you for visiting the website of Chi Energized Acupuncture & Wellness Center. It is a holistic wellness center including professional acupuncture, therapist and skincare spa. Our goal at Chi Energized Acupuncture & Wellness Center is to provide a quiet, relaxing environment for our patients and clients to receive personalized, professional health care supporting individualized healing experience only by giving natural healing method, natural herbs and organic products. We dedication to bring you all the natural treatment methods (acupuncture, herbal medicine, nutrition, supplements, diet and food therapy). These natural treatment methods are not only a masterful and gentle method to treat many diseases, but also truly help the body promote self-healing ability. We also have organic facial treatment and micro-needling with chemical free procedures to deliver you confidence without make up.
